actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to repeal the limitation on pay comparability adjustments under subchapter I of chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code.

summary.text: Repeals the limitation on pay comparability adjustments which states that pay may not be paid at a rate in excess of the basic pay for level V of the Executive Schedule. (Repeals 5 U.S.C. 5308)

titles.title: A bill to repeal the limitation on pay comparability adjustments under subchapter I of chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code.
